behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Variation ID used when calculating the action ID.

turnVellocity.Wiki: Rotational speed [degrees / second] that can turn in 1 second.

hitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

hitYOffset.Wiki: Offset of the model display position in the Y (height) direction. It can be floated from the hit position.

getSoul.Wiki: The amount of soul that a character can get at the time of death.

ItemLotId1.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

ItemLotId2.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

ItemLotId3.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

ItemLotId4.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

ItemLotId5.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

ItemLotId6.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: Special effect ID for lap bonus

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: Set the damage cut rate when guarding for each attack

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: If it is not a guard attack, enter 0

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the fire attack?

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the electric shock attack?

animidOffset.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the original anime ID is referenced.

lockGazePoint0.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [0]
lockGazePoint0.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint1.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [1]
lockGazePoint1.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint2.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [2]
lockGazePoint2.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint3.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [3]
lockGazePoint3.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint4.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [4]
lockGazePoint4.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint5.AltName: Lock Gaze Point - Dummy Poly ID [5]
lockGazePoint5.Wiki: Gaze at the Damipoli specified when locking the Lock-on Damipoly 22X (-1 Invalid)

networkWarpDisp.Wiki: Distance to warp instead of complementary movement in network synchronization. Faster people (ex dragons) need to be longer.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the animation ID of the animation ID offset 1 is referred to.

resistCurse.Wiki: Difficulty in dealing with abnormal curse conditions

ghostModelId.Wiki: Replacement model when wandering ghost, texture ID

normalChangeResourceId.Wiki: Replace resource ID during normal operation (do not use it unnecessarily)

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense range angle when guarding weapons. Pending

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: Normal replacement texture character ID (do not use it unnecessarily)

dropType.Wiki: Display method when dropping an item (corpse emission or item display)

teamType.Wiki: Determines enemy\ally\aggro\damage status in relation to other teams.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Set the attack type to apply site damage

guardLevel.Wiki: Determines guard hit anim used depending on incoming damageLevel.

parryAttack.Wiki: If this is greater than defender's Parry Defense, the attack cannot be parried.

parryDefense.Wiki: If this is equal to or greater than attacker's Parry Attack, the attack can be parried.

sfxSize.Wiki: Determines which version of a SpEffect's VFX to use (i.e. bigger poison clouds on bigger enemies).

hitStopType.Wiki: Setting whether to perform hit stop processing

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: Upper side of the ladder end judgment offset

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: Lower side of ladder end judgment offset

UseRagdollCamHit.Wiki: Does the camera hit the enemy ragdoll? (Valid only when hitting the player)

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If you want to prevent the cross rigid from hitting you

useUndulationAddAnimFB.Wiki: Whether to use front and back undulation addition

isWeakA.Wiki: Special attack A? Special attack A damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isGhost.Wiki: The opponent's attack will be able to slip through. The attack hits only when the anti-spirit weapon of the weapon para is attacked with the weapon of . Be careful not to confuse it with a wandering ghost

isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: Do you not play the damage motion when the damage is 0?

isUnduration.Wiki: Do you match the back and forth rotation of the character with the undulations of the ground? Cannot be used for flying characters

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: Will it be a wandering ghost when the player is a client?

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: Do you want to enable the swing set in Param Weaver?

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: Do you want to play the moving animation until the animation is over? (Like a mayfly dragon.)

isCrowd.Wiki: Do you want to reduce the processing load during crowds? For babies (preferably phalanx)

isWeakB.Wiki: Special attack B? Special attack B damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakC.Wiki: Special attack C? Special attack C damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakD.Wiki: Special attack D? Special attack D damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

doesAlwaysUseSpecialTurn.Wiki: Always execute a special turn (even if there is no navigation mesh at the turn destination, the special turn is continuously executed)

VowType0.Wiki:
Determines Vow ID depending on permutation of flags.
ABC
000 - Vow 0
100 - Vow 1
010 - Vow 2
110 - Vow 3
001 - Vow 4
101 - Vow 5
011 - Vow 6
111 - Vow 7

VowType1.Wiki:
Determines Vow ID depending on permutation of flags.
ABC
000 - Vow 0
100 - Vow 1
010 - Vow 2
110 - Vow 3
001 - Vow 4
101 - Vow 5
011 - Vow 6
111 - Vow 7

VowType2.Wiki:
Determines Vow ID depending on permutation of flags.
ABC
000 - Vow 0
100 - Vow 1
010 - Vow 2
110 - Vow 3
001 - Vow 4
101 - Vow 5
011 - Vow 6
111 - Vow 7

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If you do not make an initial death, TRUE, even if you kill and save it, the corpse will not be reproduced.

isHitRumble.Wiki: TRUE if it vibrates when hit. Use when you want to change from a normal hit stop, such as a dead person.

isSmoothTurn.Wiki: Whether to perform interpolation when turning between nodes in route movement

isWeakE.Wiki: Special attack E? Special attack E damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakF.Wiki: Special attack F? Special attack F damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

modelDispMask16.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask17.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask18.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask19.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask20.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask21.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask22.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask23.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask24.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask25.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask26.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask27.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask28.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask29.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask30.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask31.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

itemSearchRadius.Wiki: Radius to be added as a correction to the cylinder radius of normal Item search judgment (applicable to enemy drop items. Used for large characters etc.)

chrHitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

isSoulGetByBoss.Wiki: Do you get a boss in soul?

isBulletOwner_byObject.Wiki: If you become the owner of a bullet, a flag that applies the object's damage calculation related to the bullet. Used for damage correction by power.

isUseLowHitFootIk.AltName: Use FootIK Filter for Low Hit
isUseLowHitFootIk.Wiki: Whether to use the FootIk filter for low hits

isCalculatePvPDamage.Wiki: Decide whether to calculate damage as a player when calculating damage. If it is invalid, it is treated as an enemy.

isHostSyncChr.Wiki: Can only be activated when active in the host world

isSkipWeakDamageAnim.Wiki: Weakness damage Whether to skip animation playback. Part damage rate and defense material are treated as weak points just by not playing the animation.

specialTurnDistanceThreshold.Wiki: Make a special turn when the distance to the target is greater than or equal to the set threshold

autoFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The SFX identifier used in the automatic foot effect. (ZZZ of XYYZZZ)

subMaterial.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

subMaterialSfx.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

material_Weak.Wiki: Determines the SE that sounds when the weak point is damaged. 2

materialSfx_Weak.Wiki: Determines the SFX that occurs when the weak point is damaged. 2

subMaterial_weak.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

subMaterialSfx_weak.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

autoFootEffectDecalBaseId1.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - Decal Base ID [1]
autoFootEffectDecalBaseId1.Wiki: Decal to be attached when a foot effect occurs. Floor material is also taken into consideration

toughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Correction value for toughness recovery time

npcPlayerWeightType.Wiki: Equipment weight type applied for NPC players

normalChangeAnimChrId.Wiki: Replace the target animation with the specified ID Anibnd

PhantomParamId.Wiki: ID of the phantom parameter .xlsm to apply

maxAnklePitchAngle.Wiki: FootIK Ankle pitch limit angle (-1 no limit). If you have not set Foot End L S in HAT, this angle is used in common with rolls.

resistFrost.Wiki: Difficulty in getting cold air condition abnormal

freezeGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power against cold air (set as a special effect parameter)

lockCamParamId.Wiki: The ID of the lock camera parameter applied to the camera when locked on. Highest priority. Unused if -1

disableLockOnAng.Wiki: Create a conical lock-on non-lockable area beneath the enemy. The angle of the size of the cone. Can be changed temporarily from TAE

clothOffLodLevel.AltName: LOD Level to Disable Cloth Processing
clothOffLodLevel.Wiki: Set the LOD level to turn off cross processing

estusFlaskRecoveryParamId.Wiki: When the character dies, the data ID of the est usage count recovery parameter .xlsm, which is the same as the value, is acquired and the est bottle is recovered. Unused if -1

roleNameId.Wiki: Specify the role name at the time of summoning. -1 Use the default role name of the target spirit body. 0 No display. 1 or more Used as a text ID.

estusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: HP / MP est recovery probability when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

hpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

mpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP/FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: Next time probability increase value when you miss the HP / MP est recovery lottery. Addition value of numerator.

hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when you miss the HP Est Recovery Lottery. Addition value of numerator.

mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when the MP est recovery lottery is missed. Addition value of numerator.

WanderGhostPhantomId.Wiki: Phantom shader with ID specified only on the guest side Specify the phantom shader ID and make it an illusion

hearingHeadSize.Wiki: The offset size to be set instead of the capsule offset at the time of hearing judgment. Use this value as an offset only if it is set to 0 or higher.
